mapper.sql: id as id , student_no as studentNo , academy_name as academyName , college_name as collegeName , major_name as majorName , student_name as studentName , length_schooling as lengthSchooling , gender as gender , nation as nation , political_outlook as politicalOutlook , student_place as studentPlace , enterprise_ownership as enterpriseOwnership , unit_name as unitName , unit_address as unitAddress , enterprise_type as enterpriseType , unit_properties as unitProperties , unit_industry as unitIndustry , grade as grade , create_time as createTime , modify_time as modifyTime
